questions.question: What is the predominant color of the displayed carry-on suitcase?
Considering the image, what material appears to constitute the suitcase's exterior?
Based on visual inspection, how many wheels support the suitcase's mobility?
What is the overall shape of the presented piece of luggage, as shown in the product image?
Judging by the image, what type of handle is visibly present on the suitcase's side?
Does the suitcase's exterior exhibit a visibly textured or smooth finish, according to the provided image?
From the provided view, are there any noticeable patterns or designs printed on the suitcase's surface?
What is the apparent size of the depicted luggage, categorized as carry-on or checked?
Considering the image, what is the visible condition of the suitcase's wheels, new or worn?
From the provided perspective, are there any visible zippers or closures on the main compartment?
Judging from the image alone, what is the overall apparent quality of the suitcase's construction?
Based on the visual details, does the suitcase seem rigid or flexible in its construction?
Are there any visible external pockets or compartments on the suitcase's surface, as seen in the image?
What is the apparent design style of the suitcase: modern, vintage, or other?
Does the image show any significant scuffs, scratches, or other damage to the suitcase?
